backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SurgeryCase, Task, and UserProfile types with CRUD operations for veterinary surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI configuration; includes authorization mixins for admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend TypeScript/React components covering authentication, case management with task tracking, CSV import/export, search/filter functionality, and form validation with date handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme tokens including colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, multiple favicon sizes, Apple touch icons, and theme color configuration for the SurgiPaw application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining SurgiPaw as a standalone app with icons, theme colors, and display settings for installation on mobile devices.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell on install, and skipping Internet Identity and API calls from caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing view routing (dashboard/cases/settings), authentication state, profile setup modal, admin-only settings access, case navigation with highlighting, and forced light theme enforcement.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: React context providing username/password authentication with login, register, logout functions, session persistence via localStorage (remember me) or sessionStorage, and mock implementation pending backend integration.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Main authentication view component that toggles between login and registration forms, includes header with logo and footer with branding.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login form component with username/password inputs, remember-me checkbox, validation, and loading states that calls the auth context login method.
Logout button component that displays username and triggers logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for initial profile setup that prompts users to enter their name after registration.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Registration form component with username, password, and confirm password fields that validates inputs and calls the auth context register method.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Validation utility functions for username (3-30 chars), password (8+ chars), and password matching with typed validation results.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with configuration, default selections, and utility functions for calculating task progress and styling.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Card component displaying surgery case details with editable notes, task checklist management, delete functionality, and progress tracking with color-coded task badges.

Dialog component for creating and editing surgery cases with form fields for patient/owner details, AI-powered structured text parsing, checklist task selection, and auto-prefill from matched medical record numbers.
Main list view component that displays filtered and sorted surgery cases with search, species/task filters, CSV import/export, and handles case selection with scroll-to-highlight functionality.
Search input component with clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for sorting cases by different criteria using predefined sort options.
Popover filter component with checkboxes for filtering cases by species, persisting selections to session storage.
Popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completed status, with session storage persistence and active filter count badge.
Reusable checklist component that supports both creation mode (selecting tasks) and completion mode (marking tasks complete) with color-coded task items.
React component providing UI for CSV import/export of surgery cases with progress tracking, error display, and batch create/update operations using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Custom date input component with calendar picker that auto-formats MM/DD/YYYY input, validates dates, and supports auto-advance to next field on completion.
Core CSV import/export logic that parses CSV files into surgery case data, validates fields, handles updates vs. creates by matching medical record numbers, and generates downloadable CSV files.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for surgery cases including headers, field descriptions, validation constants for species/sex/booleans, and date format specifications.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species, task types, completion status, and whether all selected tasks are completed.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l), and removing artifacts as fallback for AI analysis.
Parses semi-structured text with label:value pairs into CaseFormData by matching field patterns, handling species/sex/date parsing, and serving as fallback for AI responses and Quick Fill feature.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases by creating a hidden iframe with styled HTML content and triggering the browser's native print dialog. Includes case details and remaining checklist tasks in a landscape-oriented table format.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases with their remaining tasks. Handles CSV field escaping for special characters and creates a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utilities for PDF display including date conversion from bigint nanoseconds to MM/DD/YYYY, species/sex enum to readable text conversion, text truncation, and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utilities for CSV reports including date conversion from bigint nanoseconds to MM/DD/YYYY and species/sex enum to readable text conversion.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters surgery cases by matching query text against basic fields (MRN, names, species, etc.) and remaining checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for future AI image analysis functionality.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases with options for arrival date (newest/oldest) and open task count (most/fewest), using checklist items to calculate remaining tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms including species/sex options and the CaseFormData interface with all required case fields.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including required field validation, species/sex enum parsing with flexible string matching, boolean parsing, and date validation/parsing utilities.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays surgery cases with filtering, searching, sorting, and PDF export capabilities. Shows case cards with species badges, arrival dates, and remaining tasks with icons, and includes a task filter sidebar.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions for calculating open tasks across cases, including extracting open task items from individual cases and computing total open task counts using checklist items.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: React component for configuring OpenAI API key with validation status display, secure input field with show/hide toggle, and save functionality using custom hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a changing value with a configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider component with login, logout, and identity management using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, user profiles, tasks, and OpenAI configuration, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme for the application, including specialized colors for patient names, species, complaints, and notes fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge CSS class names intelligently.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable module types.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf module types.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker interface, recognition options, result structures, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended font families, border radius variables, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file indicating an authentication app with pending fixes for AuthProvider context wrapping issues in main.tsx causing runtime errors.
